headline: PPG launches PPG HI-GARD Non-Methanol hard coating for ophthalmic lenses
summary: PITTSBURGH, September 16, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the launch of PPG HI-GARD® Non-Methanol hard coating for 1.5 standard index ophthalmic lenses. Developed as a drop-in replacement for traditional methanol-based coatings, the new formulation enables prescription lens makers to stay ahead of evolving regulatory requirements on methanol use while maintaining durability performance.

headline: PPG Launches VELOCITY Refinish System Built for Durability
summary: PPG debuts its VELOCITY refinish system, offering durable performance, fast application and cost-effective solutions for busy body shops.
